description: Gets information about the current ClientCertificate resource.

parameters.name: clientCertificateId
parameters.description: The identifier of the ClientCertificate resource to be described.

nested_items.name: clientCertificateId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the client certificate.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the client certificate.

nested_items.name: pemEncodedCertificate
nested_items.description: The PEM-encoded public key of the client certificate, which can be used to configure certificate authentication in the integration endpoint .

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the client certificate was created.

nested_items.name: expirationDate
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the client certificate will expire.
